error.maxDurationSmallerThanMinDuration: Maximum duration is less than minimum duration

error.beginAfterEnd: Season start date is later than end date
error.beginBeforePeriodBegin: Season start date is too early
error.beginAfterPeriodEnd: Season start date is too late
error.endAfterPeriodEnd: Season end date is too late
error.endBeforeBegin: Season end date is earlier than start date
error.endBeforePeriodBegin: Season end date is too early
error.missingSchedule: Add at least one timeslot for all season reservations
error.reservationUnitTooSmall: This premises is too small for group
error.noReservationUnits: Add one or more premises to the application
error.noEvents: Add one or more season reservations to the application
